title: Authorities Investigate Fatal Shooting of 3-year-old Boy
content:
EUTAW, Ala. (AP) Authorities say a 3-year-old boy has been fatally shot at a home west Alabama.
AL.com reports that Alabama State Trooper Reginal King said the boy died of a gunshot wound. King said the incident occurred shortly after 3 p.m. Friday at a home.
King said three people of interest are in custody, and are being held in the Greene County Jail for questioning. Neither one of them have been charged.
Troopers are still investigating the matter.
